Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix Suns and Miami Heat will face off in a non-conference matchup on November 7, 2024.
Phoenix Suns have a record of 6-1 and are second in the Western Conference.
Miami Heat have a record of 3-3 and are third in the Eastern Conference.
The betting line for the game is Suns -5.5 with an over/under of 222.5 points.
Phoenix Suns went 49-33 overall with a 24-16 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
Miami Heat finished 46-36 overall with a 24-17 record on the road last season.
Phoenix Suns averaged 7.4 steals, 6.0 blocks, and 14.1 turnovers per game last season.
Miami Heat averaged 110.1 points per game while allowing opponents to score 108.4 last season.
Injuries for the game include Kevin Love (day to day, reconditioning) and Jaime Jaquez Jr. (day to day, illness) for the Miami Heat.
